templates.Standard Summary: Please create a concise summary of the following transcript. Identify key points, decisions, and action items if present.
templates.Meeting Notes: Please analyze this meeting transcript and create structured notes with these sections: 1) Attendees, 2) Key Discussion Points, 3) Decisions Made, 4) Action Items with Owners, 5) Next Steps
templates.Executive Summary: Create an executive summary of this transcript. Focus on strategic implications, key decisions, and recommendations. Keep it brief but comprehensive.
